Detailed Description

The FuncBinder is a simple struct that binds user-defined indices to functions. It is useful for binding eg. keyboard events to specific actions in your program, but can potentially have many other uses as well.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OEngine::Input::FuncBinder::FuncBinder ( int  number  )  [inline]

Constructor. Initialize the struct by telling it how many action indices you intend to bind.

The indices you use should be 0 <= i < number.
